title: How Vivid Is Your Mental Imagery?
description: A 60-second lesson on How Vivid Is Your Mental Imagery?.

hook.text: Imagine a sunset. Can you see the colors? Feel the warmth? Hear the waves? Mental imagery vividness varies wildly.

buildup.text: The VVIQ (Vividness of Visual Imagery Questionnaire) measures how clearly people 'see' in their minds.

discovery.text: High-vividness imagers literally activate their visual cortex when imagining â€” their brain 'sees' despite closed eyes.

twist.text: Vividness doesn't predict creativity. Some brilliant artists have weak imagery.

climax.text: But vivid imagery does predict emotional response to imagined scenarios â€” useful for empathy, planning, and motivation.

punchline.text: Mental imagery is like a screen. Some have 4K. Some have radio. Both work.
